name: Crush Course
description:
Controls

  • A [Left], D [Right] : Move
  • W [Up]: Jump
  • [Space]: Whistle (when available)
  • R: Restart level
  • M: Turn off/on music

Created for Weekly Game Jam 186: Alternate Perspectives.

Music

  • gameMusic.wav | rap2h | CC Attribution

Sounds

  • whistle0.wav | OwlStorm | CC0
  • whistle1.wav | frisko28i | CC0
  • whistle2.wav | Raclure | CC0
  • yay.wav | Higgs01 | CC0

Software

  • Created with Haxe, Heaps.io, deepnightLibs, and GIMP.
